mapper.select: SELECT A.ID,A.NICKNAME,A.USERNAME,B.DEPID,C.DEPNAME,B.ORGID,A.USERSTATUS FROM JBOS_USER A LEFT JOIN JBOS_EMP B ON A.LOGINNAME=B.BADGE LEFT JOIN JBOS_DEP C ON B.DEPID=C.ID WHERE A.NICKNAME=#{loginName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JBOS_USER_ROLE(USERID,ROLEID) VALUES(#{userId},(SELECT ID FROM JBOS_ROLE WHERE ROLECODE='ROLE_DEFAULT'))
